scripts.postinstall: apt-get update && apt-get install -y chromium fonts-liberation libappindicator3-1 libasound2 libatk-bridge2.0-0 libatspi2.0-0 libcups2 libdbus-1-3 libdrm2 libgbm1 libnspr4 libnss3 libxcomposite1 libxrandr2 libxss1 wget --no-install-recommends || echo 'Dependencies already installed'
